import React from "react"; import style from "./Cart.module.css" import Header from "../Header/Header"; import Navigation from "../Navbar/Navigation"; import samsung from "../../images/samsungOrder.png" import {FontAwesomeIcon} from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import {faRemove} from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import OrderForm from "../Order-Form/OrderForm"; function Cart(){ return(
